head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths GANZ, IRENE (NEE DENSEN)

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths GANZ, IRENE (NEE DENSEN)

block.p: GANZ-Irene (nee Densen). On May 2, 2000 at age 100. Cherished wife of the late William L. Ganz. Beloved mother of Arnold and Enid Ganz, Lenore and Seymour Epstein. Loving grandmother of Austin and Cheryl, Harrison and Heidi Ganz, Andrea and Robert Vogel, and the late Burt and Carol Epstein. Cherished great grandmother to Evan, Bradford, Jordan Ganz, and Warin and Jessica Epstein. Graveside services Wednesday, May 3, 2 PM at Beth David Cemetery, Elmont, NY.
